About Me

Hi, my name’s Ruben and I’m a Graduate student with 4 years of experience in Application Development (Web/Desktop) and Data Warehousing. Proficient in Java, Python, JavaScript, MySQL, Snowflake, and other frameworks like Angular, JSF, Hibernate, and Pandas. Experienced with Linux, Power BI, Azure, Vim, Git, Subversion, and other tools like JIRA, Redmine, and Bugzilla

Projects

International Storytelling Center Project

International Storytelling Center

I am currently engaged in an ongoing Natural Language Processing (NLP) project in collaboration with the International Storytelling Center. The project aims to digitize and transcribe a vast historical archive of over 50 years of performance recordings, making them more easily accessible and searchable for researchers, scholars, and other interested parties. Additionally, this project allows for the development of new research and analysis methods and aims to preserve the rich history of the performances for future generations.

Disease Diagnosis

A Natural Language Processing and classification project to diagnose disease based on symptoms described by the patients using Python (Pandas, NumPy, Scikit-learn, Keras, TensorFlow)
